SECTION_SUBTITLE: One generator, many pages. Less code, more efficiency.
MAIN_CONTENT:
The Problem: Script Bloat

Having 27+ separate generation scripts means agents have to read through thousands of lines of duplicate code.

This causes context bloat and makes it harder to understand the system as you scale.

The V2 Solution

‚úì One Generator

Single script handles all pages

‚úì Data-Driven

JSON files, no code duplication

‚úì Central Registry

One file to understand all pages

‚úì 95% Context Savings

Agents read less, do more

How To Use This System

Create JSON ‚Üí Run Generator ‚Üí Done

Copy this JSON file, modify the content for your new page, then run: node scripts/generate-page.js your-page-slug

üìÑ Step 1

Create JSON data file in frontend/data/pages/

‚öôÔ∏è Step 2

Run: node scripts/generate-page.js [slug]

‚úÖ Step 3

HTML generated, registry updated automatically

Benefits for Future Work

  • ‚úÖ No more script duplication
  • ‚úÖ Agents read 1 generator instead of 27+
  • ‚úÖ Central registry for page discovery
  • ‚úÖ Easy to query pages by category, date, etc.
  • ‚úÖ Scales to 100+ pages without context issues
